  • Method Details

    • getFee

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<FeeResponse> getFee(@RequestParam Optional<String> city, @RequestParam Optional<String> vehicle, @RequestParam(required=false) Optional<LocalDateTime> dateTime) throws org.apache.coyote.BadRequestException, VehicleForbiddenException
      Calculate fee based on specified city and vehicle. If dateTime parameter is not entered the last weather data will be taken. Returns an EntityModel with calculated fee or the error message
      Parameters:
      city - Query parameter - city for which the weather needs to be checked.
      vehicle - Query parameter - transport for which the fee needs to be calculated.
      dateTime - Optional query parameter - if present, specifies the date and time for which weather data should be obtained, otherwise the latest weather data is taken.
      Returns:
      EntityModel with calculated fee based on specified parameters or the error message.
      Throws:
      org.apache.coyote.BadRequestException - if parameters were specified improperly.
      VehicleForbiddenException - if weather conditions are forbidden for the specified transport.
      ExtraWeatherConditionsNotFoundException - if one of weather conditions are not found.
      RegionalBaseFeeNotFoundException - if no RegionalBaseFee is found for the specified city.
